Title: Pilot
Plot: A documentary crew arrives at the offices of Dunder Mifflin to observe the employees and learn about modern management. Manager Michael Scott tries to paint a happy picture, while sales rep Jim fights with his nemesis Dwight and flirts with receptionist Pam.
Writer: Greg Daniels, Ricky Gervais, Stephen Merchant
GuestStars: Melora Hardin, David Denman, Angela Kinsey, Brian Baumgartner, Leslie David Baker, Oscar Nu√±ez, Phyllis Smith, Henriette Mantel, Mike McCaul
